role.argrole: towards what? (marked by إلى / ل / في)

example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الحكومة)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM سباقة)) (PP (PREP في) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN دعوة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN مصر)) (PP-MNR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN صورة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN مستمرة))) (PP-CLR (PREP ل) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN لمشاركة)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN جهود) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السلام))) (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه))))))))))) (PUNC ,)
